DOC.criteria: 1 . A history normal regular menstrual cycle ( 2535 day ) ; 2 . A normal physical examination ; 3 . A body mass index ( BMI ) 19 & 29 4 . A normal CBC , normal Prolactin level , normal LFT 's 5 . A negative urinary hCG initiation study ; 6 . An agreement refrain attempt conceive experimental cycle cycle thereafter either abstinence and/or use barrier method contraception .
